evidence.description: Handwritten logs documenting extended solitary confinement (months to years) and deliberate psychological torture. Shows systematic human rights violations by prison administration.

evidence.name: DNA Test Results
evidence.description: DNA analysis results that prove your innocence in the crime you were convicted for. The evidence was suppressed during your trial. Could exonerate you if presented to the right authorities.

evidence.name: List of Missing Prisoners
evidence.description: A compiled list of 47 prisoners who officially 'transferred' but never arrived at their destination facilities. Strong evidence of systematic disappearances and potential murders covered up by the prison administration.
